actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain lands in Imperial County, California, that became Federal property by the process of accretion be sold to the persons who would be the current owners of such lands but for such accretion.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to sell specified land in Imperial County, California, to claimants whose title to such lands has inured to the United States by the process of accretion.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain lands in Imperial County, California, that became Federal property by the process of accretion be sold to the persons who would be the current owners of such lands but for such accretion.
